meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The topi grazed peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of topi running across the grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The topi decided to challenge the cheetah to a race.
meanings.sent4: Her speed on the track was like a topi racing across the plains.
meanings.sent5: The topi's horns gleamed in the sunlight as it bounded gracefully.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Indian hat.
meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful topi to the festival.
meanings.sent2: The topi protected his head from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The topi flew off in the strong wind, causing laughter all around.
meanings.sent4: His topi was a symbol of his cultural heritage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on the topi caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The highest point or part of something.
meanings.sent1: The mountain's topi was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: He reached the topi of the tree after a challenging climb.
meanings.sent3: The topi of the tower offered a breathtaking view of the city.
meanings.sent4: Her grades reached the topi of the class.
meanings.sent5: The topi of the roller coaster provided an exhilarating experience.
